xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.3 Ganthasampayuttaduka » 5.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.3.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 5.3.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
96.
1827Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
1828Anulomaṃ.
<< 5.3.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
